item.title: Help with command I made?
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:379149”][quote author=Pblord7 link=topic=474999.msg3473366#msg3473366 date=1295474937]
heres my yell code, but when the players rating is under 0 it doesnt send the message?

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && rating > 0)
        { 
        String titles = "";
        if (rating >= 15 && rating < 50) {
                titles = "[Reg] ";
        }
        if (rating >= 50 && rating < 100) {
                titles = "[Ded] ";
        }
        if (rating >= 100) {
                titles = "[Legend] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
        }
	if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
        }
	if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Mod] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 99) {
                sM("You need to be donator To use the yell channel");
        return;
        }
        if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7")) {
                titles = "[Main Owner]";
        }
        if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tuthan")) {
                titles = "[Coder/Co-Owner]";
        }
        talk(titles + "" + playerName + " : " + command.substring(5));
        }
if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && rating < 0)
        {
	sM("You need to vote once to yell!");
        }

[/quote]

Identifier means ABOVE ONLY

= Identifier means Equal too, AND above. << Use this instead.[/quote]
/facepalm
You need 1 rating+ to yell.
sM(“You need to vote once to yell!”); <— Isn’t saying that…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with command I made?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Pblord7, post:1, topic:379149”]heres my yell code, but when the players rating is under 0 it doesnt send the message?

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && rating > 0) { String titles = ""; if (rating >= 15 && rating < 50) { titles = "[Reg] "; } if (rating >= 50 && rating < 100) { titles = "[Ded] "; } if (rating >= 100) { titles = "[Legend] "; } if (playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Player] "; } if (playerRights == 4) { titles = "[Player] "; } if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Player] "; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[Mod] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Admin] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[Co-Owner] "; } if (playerRights == 99) { sM("You need to be donator To use the yell channel"); return; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7")) { titles = "[Main Owner]"; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tuthan")) { titles = "[Coder/Co-Owner]"; } talk(titles + "" + playerName + " : " + command.substring(5)); } if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && rating < 0) { sM("You need to vote once to yell!"); } [/quote]

Identifier means ABOVE ONLY

= Identifier means Equal too, AND above. << Use this instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with command I made?
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

heres my yell code, but when the players rating is under 0 it doesnt send the message?

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && rating > 0)
        { 
        String titles = "";
        if (rating >= 15 && rating < 50) {
                titles = "[Reg] ";
        }
        if (rating >= 50 && rating < 100) {
                titles = "[Ded] ";
        }
        if (rating >= 100) {
                titles = "[Legend] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
        }
	if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
        }
	if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Mod] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
        }
        if (playerRights == 99) {
                sM("You need to be donator To use the yell channel");
        return;
        }
        if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7")) {
                titles = "[Main Owner]";
        }
        if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tuthan")) {
                titles = "[Coder/Co-Owner]";
        }
        talk(titles + "" + playerName + " : " + command.substring(5));
        }
if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && rating < 0)
        {
	sM("You need to vote once to yell!");
        }
